entry.summary: 据 Luxor 数据，过去两个月中，效率最高的比特币矿机的价格上涨了 9%。比特币价格上涨的同时，矿工们终于看到电价暴跌——这基本上扭转了去年挤压他们利润率并导致一些人破产的趋势。公司筹集股权资本变得越来越容易，从而使他们能够去杠杆化。（TheBlock）https://www.theblock.co/post/221222/bitcoin-rally-is-pure-gravy-for-miners-finally-seeing-a-light-at-the-end-of-the-tunnel?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss

entry.summary: 加密交易公司 Auros Global 筹集 1700 万美元新投资，传统高频交易公司 Vivienne Court Trading 和比特币矿企 Bit Digital 领投。由于 2000 万美元困住 FTX 中无法提出，Auros 在 FTX 崩盘后面临流动性危机，并进行了重大债务重组。（CoinDesk） https://www.coindesk.com/business/2023/03/21/crypto-trading-firm-auros-secures-17m-investment-as-it-recovers-from-ftx-woes/?utm_medium=social&utm_source=onecryptofeed&utm_campaign=headlines

entry.summary:
RT Manta Network 中文社区 Manta Network 推出基于 ZK 的隐私 NFT/SBT 发行平台 NPO（NFT Private Offering）🚀🚀 1/ NPO 是 NFT 和 SBT Launchpad 平台，开发者和项目方可直接利用 zkAddress 和 MantaPay 的 ZK 电路，创建 zkAddress 上的隐私 NFTs / SBTs。用户可直接使用公开资产支付 Mint 费用。
Manta Network: Today, we are announcing an expansion of @MantaNetwork's ZK capabilities by enabling privacy support for NFTs and SBTs through zkSBTs and zkNFTs. These assets can be minted through the upcoming NFT Private Offerings (NPO) platform. Read more: https://mantanetwork.medium.com/introducing-zksbts-zknfts-and-npo-89a8e6d77a7f https://t.co/QiyblBWusW

entry.title: Here’s what’s wrong with Capo; - As a trader strong opinions, should be loosely held. - Ask yourself what would I need to see to prove me wrong? If ...
entry.summary:
Here’s what’s wrong with Capo; - As a trader strong opinions, should be loosely held. - Ask yourself what would I need to see to prove me wrong? If you don’t define your invalidation, you’re never wrong. Do you want to be right or make money? Can’t do both…
il Capo Of Crypto: Despite all the noise, I know that the vast majority of those who follow me are genuine and good people. And these deserve an update: This time away from Twitter has been very good and necessary. I'm totally fine, enjoying my personal life. entry.title: If Balajis has a lot of exposure to Bitcoin already, it’s a +EV move to put this bet on and hope it goes viral. Example. He has 300m in BTC, puts on ...
entry.summary:
If Balajis has a lot of exposure to Bitcoin already, it’s a +EV move to put this bet on and hope it goes viral. Example. He has 300m in BTC, puts on bet. Because of tweet, people buy Bitcoin moving price up 1%. He pockets $2m.
Balaji: I will take that bet. You buy 1 BTC. I will send $1M USD. This is ~40:1 odds as 1 BTC is worth ~$26k. The term is 90 days. All we need is a mutually agreed custodian who will still be there to settle this in the event of digital dollar devaluation. If someone knows how to do this… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1636797265317867520 https://t.co/6Aav9KeJpe

entry.summary: Re @sanyuan2016 没说你接广告大哥, 我比较困惑这个事? 到处都在传这个指纹浏览器和IP的问题. 但是 Web3 项目方几乎没有太多必要做一个IP采集的方案, - 如果合约是公开的, 可以绕过前端页面和合约交互. - 如果是用The Graph之类的取数据, 项目方甚至不需要后端服务(数据库), 页面抓的IP都没地方存
